docs.summary: Search for payments and view their history.
Retrieve the number of Payment History Records.

docs.summary: Retrieve the number of Payment Records.

params.name: paymentHistoryRecordId
params.doc: ID of a payment history record to retrieve.

docs.summary: Retrieve a Payment History Record.

params.name: paymentRecordId
params.doc: ID of a Payment Record to retrieve.

docs.summary:
Update a Payment Record.
 Pass the latest `revision` for a successful update.

members.name: entityId
members.doc: PaymentRecord ID associated with this event.

members.name: triggeredByAnonymizeRequest
members.doc: Whether this event was triggered as a result of a privacy regulation application (e.g., GDPR).

members.name: originatedFrom
members.doc: If present, indicates the action that triggered the event.

members.name: entityId

members.name: triggeredByAnonymizeRequest
members.doc: Whether this event was triggered as a result of a privacy regulation application (e.g., GDPR).

members.name: originatedFrom
members.doc: If present, indicates the action that triggered the event.

members.name: partialRefundActionInfo
members.doc: Whether the caller can perform partial refund.

members.name: fullRefundActionInfo
members.doc: Whether the caller can full partial refund.

members.name: acceptDisputeActionInfo
members.doc: Whether the caller can accept dispute.

members.name: contestDisputeActionInfo
members.doc: Whether the caller can contest dispute.

members.name: allowed
members.doc: Whether the caller can perform partial refund.

members.name: reason
members.doc: Reason if the caller cannot perform partial refund.

members.name: allowed
members.doc: Whether the caller can full partial refund.

members.name: reason
members.doc: Reason if the caller cannot perform full refund.

members.name: allowed
members.doc: Whether the caller can accept dispute.

members.name: reason
members.doc: Reason if the caller cannot accept dispute.

members.name: allowed
members.doc: Whether the caller can contest dispute.

members.name: reason
members.doc: Reason if the caller cannot contest dispute.

members.name: revision
members.doc: Incremented each time the payment history record is modified.

members.name: createdDate
members.doc: Time the payment history record was created.

members.name: updatedDate
members.doc: Time the payment history record was last updated.

members.name: authorizationAmount
members.doc: Authorization amount in base units of the payment currency.

members.name: captureAmount
members.doc: Capture amount in base units of the payment currency.

members.name: refundAmount
members.doc: Refund amount in base units of the payment currency.

members.name: disputeAmount
members.doc: Dispute amount in base units of the payment currency.

members.name: cursor
members.doc:
Pointer to the next or previous page in the list of results.

You can get the relevant cursor token
from the `pagingMetadata` object in the previous call's response.
Not relevant for the first request.

members.name: count
members.doc: Number of items returned in the response.

members.name: cursors
members.doc: Cursors to navigate through the result pages using `next` and `prev`.

members.name: hasNext
members.doc:
Indicates if there are more results after the current page.
 If `true`, another page of results can be retrieved.
 If `false`, this is the last page.

members.name: next
members.doc: Cursor pointing to next page in the list of results.

members.name: prev
members.doc: Cursor pointing to previous page in the list of results.

members.name: fieldName
members.doc: Name of the field to sort by.

members.name: filter
sort
members.doc:
Sort object in the following format:
`[{"fieldName":"sortField1","order":"ASC"},{"fieldName":"sortField2","order":"DESC"}]`

members.name: cursorPaging
members.doc: Cursor token pointing to a page of results. Not used in the first request. Following requests use the cursor token and not `filter` or `sort`.

members.name: filter
aggregations
members.doc: Aggregations | Faceted search: refers to a way to explore large amounts of data by displaying summaries about various partitions of the data and later allowing to narrow the navigation to a specific partition.

members.name: search
members.doc: free text to match in searchable fields

members.name: cursorPaging
members.doc: Cursor pointing to page of results. 'cursor_paging.cursor' can not be used together with 'filter' or 'sort'

members.name: fields
members.doc: fields to search in. if empty - server will search in own default fields

members.name: fuzzy
members.doc: flag if should use auto fuzzy search (allowing typos by a managed proximity algorithm)

members.name: from
members.doc: Inclusive lower bound of the range. Required if to is not given.

members.name: to
members.doc: Exclusive upper bound of the range. Required if from is not given.

members.name: limit
members.doc: How many aggregations would you like to return? Can be between 1 and 250. 10 is the default.

members.name: subdivision
members.doc: Subdivision. Usually a state, region, prefecture, or province code, according to [ISO 3166-2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-2).

members.name: addressLine2
members.doc: Free text providing more detailed address info. Usually contains Apt, Suite, and Floor.

members.name: addressLine
members.doc: Main address line, usually street and number as free text.

docs.summary: Full contact details for an address

members.name: vatId
members.doc: Tax info. Currently usable only in Brazil.

members.name: type
members.doc:
Tax type.

Supported values:
+ `CPF`: for individual tax payers
+ `CNPJ`: for corporations

docs.summary: Summary of all attempts to approve, authorize, capture, refund, and dispute a payment for a particular order.

members.name: revision
members.doc: Incremented each time the Payment Record is modified.

members.name: createdDate
members.doc: Time the Payment Record was created.

members.name: updatedDate
members.doc: Time the Payment Record was last updated.

members.name: providerInfo
members.doc: Information about a payment service provider.

members.name: amountInfo
members.doc: Amount information in base units of the payment currency.

members.name: totalAmount
members.doc: Total payment amount in base units of the payment currency.

members.name: amountBreakdown
members.doc: Amount breakdown in base units of the payment currency.

members.name: orderAppId
members.doc: ID of an application that has initiated this payment.

members.name: orderId
members.doc: ID of a corresponding order within an application that has initiated this payment.

members.name: orderNumber
members.doc: Number of a corresponding order within an application that has initiated this payment.

members.name: orderDashboardUri
members.doc: A hyperlink to a dashboard with an order that corresponds to this payment.

members.name: subscriptionId
members.doc: ID of a subscription this payment is part of.

members.name: displayName
members.doc: Line item name for display purposes.

members.name: quantity
members.doc: Quantity of units being paid for.

members.name: unitPrice
members.doc: Price of one unit in base units of the payment currency.

members.name: price
members.doc: Subtotal of all the line items before adding shipping price, discount and tax.

members.name: shipping
members.doc: Shipping price before applying discount and tax.

members.name: installmentCount
members.doc: Number of installments a customer requested to pay in.

members.name: offSessionSetup
members.doc: Whether the payment starts a series of payments initiated on schedule or by a merchant.

members.name: offSession
members.doc: Whether the payment is initiated on schedule or by a merchant.

members.name: moto
members.doc: Whether this is a mail order/telephone order payment.

members.name: email
members.doc: Customer's email address returned by a payment service provider.

members.name: lastDigits
members.doc: The last 4 digits of the card number.

members.name: expiryYear
members.doc: Card expiration year (4 digits, for example, 2022, 2025).

members.name: cardholderName
members.doc: Cardholder name printed on the card.

members.name: brandId
members.doc:
Card issuer's brand.
 Supported values are `MasterCard`, `Visa`, `Electron`, `Amex`, `Diners`, `Discover`, `Jcb`, `ChinaUnionPay`, `Maestro`, `CartesBancaires`.

members.name: accountOwnerName
members.doc: Name of the bank account owner.

members.name: merchantAccountEmail
members.doc: Merchant's email address returned by a payment service provider.

members.name: providerPaymentId
members.doc: Corresponding payment ID on side of a payment service provider.

members.name: providerDashboardUri
members.doc: A hyperlink to a payment dashboard on side of a payment service provider.

members.name: authorizedAmount
members.doc: Amount authorized. Does not change on capture.

members.name: processingFeeAmount
members.doc: Amount taken by a payment service provider for processing.

members.name: netAmount
members.doc: Amount your customer has paid minus Wix fees.

members.name: capturableAmount
members.doc: Maximum amount that can potentially be captured in addition to what has already been captured.

members.name: pendingCaptureAmount
members.doc: Total amount in progress to be captured soon.

members.name: capturedAmount
members.doc: Total amount that has been captured already. Does not change on refunds or chargebacks.

members.name: refundableAmount
members.doc: Maximum amount that can potentially be refunded in addition to what has already been refunded.

members.name: pendingRefundAmount
members.doc: Total amount in progress to be refunded soon.

members.name: refundedAmount
members.doc: Total amount that has been refunded already.

members.name: rfiOpenAmount
members.doc: Total amount specified in inquiries (requests for information) waiting for response.

members.name: rfiUnderReviewAmount
members.doc: Total amount specified in inquiries (requests for information) under review.

members.name: rfiClosedAmount
members.doc: Total amount specified in inquiries (requests for information) not escalated to chargebacks.

members.name: chargebackOpenAmount
members.doc: Total amount specified in chargebacks waiting for response (either contest or acceptance).

members.name: chargebackUnderReviewAmount
members.doc: Total amount specified in contested chargebacks under review.

members.name: disputeLostAmount
members.doc: Total amount of disputes lost with chargebacks.

members.name: disputeWonAmount
members.doc: Total amount of won disputes with chargebacks reversed.

members.name: paths
members.doc: The set of field mask paths.

members.name: paymentRecordId
members.doc: ID of a Payment Record to retrieve.

members.name: paymentRecordId
members.doc: ID of a Payment Record to obtain action info for.

members.name: actionInfo
members.doc: Information about actions allowed for a Payment Record.

docs.summary:
Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN_REASON
  • NOT_AUTHORIZED
  • BALANCE_INSUFFICIENT
  • REFUND_IN_PROGRESS
  • PAYMENT_DISPUTED
  • PROVIDER_NOT_SUPPORTED
  • PAYMENT_METHOD_NOT_SUPPORTED
  • MERCHANT_ACCOUNT_NOT_SUPPORTED

Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN_REASON
  • NOT_AUTHORIZED
  • BALANCE_INSUFFICIENT
  • REFUND_IN_PROGRESS
  • PAYMENT_DISPUTED
  • PROVIDER_NOT_SUPPORTED
  • PAYMENT_METHOD_NOT_SUPPORTED

Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN_REASON
  • NOT_AUTHORIZED

Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN_REASON
  • NOT_AUTHORIZED

Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN_PAYMENT_STATUS
  • CREATED - Created by an application
  • STARTED - Started by a customer
  • PENDING - Online flow completed
  • DECLINED - Failed but can be restarted
  • AUTHORIZED - Money on hold
  • CANCELED - Manually canceled, no more payment attempts allowed, existing authorization voided if any
  • EXPIRED - Automatically expired, no more payment attempts allowed, existing authorization voided if any
  • PENDING_CAPTURE - Waiting for async capture processing
  • CAPTURE_FAILED - Capture action failed
  • PARTIALLY_CAPTURED - Authorized amount captured partially
  • CAPTURED - Authorized amount captured fully
  • PENDING_REFUND - Waiting for async refund processing
  • REFUND_FAILED - Refund action failed
  • PARTIALLY_REFUNDED - Captured amount refunded partially
  • REFUNDED - Captured amount refunded fully
  • SUSPICIOUS - Early fraud warning
  • RFI_OPEN - Inquiry issued
  • RFI_UNDER_REVIEW - Inquiry contested
  • RFI_CLOSED - Inquiry contest succeeded
  • CHARGEBACK_OPEN - Chargeback issued
  • CHARGEBACK_UNDER_REVIEW - Chargeback contested
  • DISPUTE_WON - Dispute won, chargeback reverted
  • DISPUTE_LOST - Dispute lost, includes cases where contest not supported

Possible values are:
  • ASC
  • DESC

Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN_AGGREGATION_TYPE
  • VALUE
  • RANGE
  • SCALAR

Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN_SCALAR_TYPE
  • COUNT_DISTINCT
  • MIN
  • MAX
  • SUM
  • AVG

Possible values are:
  • OR - any
  • AND - all

Possible values are:
  • COUNT
  • VALUE

Possible values are:
  • DESC
  • ASC

tax info types Possible values are:
  • UNSPECIFIED
  • CPF - CPF - for individual tax payers.
  • CNPJ - CNPJ - for corporations

Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN_SUBDIVISION_TYPE
  • ADMINISTRATIVE_AREA_LEVEL_1 - State
  • ADMINISTRATIVE_AREA_LEVEL_2 - County
  • ADMINISTRATIVE_AREA_LEVEL_3 - City/town
  • ADMINISTRATIVE_AREA_LEVEL_4 - Neighborhood/quarter
  • ADMINISTRATIVE_AREA_LEVEL_5 - Street/block
  • COUNTRY - ADMINISTRATIVE_AREA_LEVEL_0. Indicates the national political entity, and is typically the highest order type returned by the Geocoder.

Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN_RISK_STATUS
  • LOW
  • MEDIUM
  • HIGH
